ClassHasAllBaseClasses.description: Relates a given ECClassId (Source) to all its base classes (recursively) (Target). For optimization reasons this ECRelationshipClass also holds a row for each ECClass that points to itself. Base class id order: class itself, then base classes in breadth first manner.

properties.description: ECClassType::CustomAttribute: Specifies on which containers the custom attribute ECClass can be applied to.
properties.name: CustomAttributeContainerType

properties.description: Applies to ECClassType::Relationship only.
properties.name: RelationshipStrength

properties.description: Applies to ECClassType::Relationship only.
properties.name: RelationshipStrengthDirection

properties.description: Position of the ECProperty in its ECClass
properties.name: Ordinal

properties.description: ECPropertyKind::Primitive: data type. ECPropertyKind::PrimitiveArray: data type of array elements.
properties.name: PrimitiveType

properties.description: Minimum length of strings or blobs.
properties.name: PrimitiveTypeMinLength

properties.description: Maximum length of strings or blobs.
properties.name: PrimitiveTypeMaxLength

properties.description: Minimum value of numeric primitives.
properties.name: PrimitiveTypeMinValue

properties.description: Maximum value of numeric primitives.
properties.name: PrimitiveTypeMaxValue

properties.description: ECPropertyKind::Primitive: Id of this property's ECEnumerationDef.
properties.name: Enumeration

properties.description: ECPropertyKind::Primitive or ECPropertyKind::PrimitiveArray: Extended type name further describing PrimitiveType.
properties.name: ExtendedTypeName

properties.description: ECPropertyKind::Struct: ECClassId of property's struct type. ECPropertyKind::StructArray: ECClassId of array element struct type.
properties.name: StructClass

properties.description: ECPropertyKind::Primitive or ECPropertyKind::PrimitiveArray: Id of this property's KindOfQuantityDef.
properties.name: KindOfQuantity

properties.description: Id of this property's PropertyCategoryDef.
properties.name: Category

properties.description: ECPropertyKind::PrimitiveArray or ECPropertyKind::StructArray
properties.name: ArrayMinOccurs

properties.description: ECPropertyKind::PrimitiveArray or ECPropertyKind::StructArray
properties.name: ArrayMaxOccurs

properties.description: ECPropertyKind::Navigation: ECClassId of property's relationship class.
properties.name: NavigationRelationshipClass

properties.description: ECPropertyKind::Navigation: Direction to follow the relationship defined in NonPrimitiveTypeClassId.
properties.name: NavigationDirection

properties.description: ECClassId of base class for constraint classes of this constraint
properties.name: AbstractConstraintClass

properties.description: Position of the Composite Unit in its Format
properties.name: Ordinal

properties.description: CompositeSpec without units. Composite units are held by FormatCompositeUnitDef
properties.name: CompositeSpec

PropertyHasCategory.description: Relates the property to its PropertyCategory.

PropertyHasEnumeration.description: ECPropertyKind::Enumeration: relates the property to its ECEnumeration.

PropertyHasKindOfQuantity.description: ECPropertyKind::Primitive or ECPropertyKind::PrimitiveArray: relates the property to its KindOfQuantity.

PropertyHasNavigationRelationshipClassId.description: ECPropertyKind::Navigation: relates the navigation property to its backing RelationshipECClass.

PropertyHasStructType.description: ECPropertyKind::Struct: relates the struct property to its struct ECClass. ECPropertyKind::StructArray: relates the struct array property to its array element type.

properties.description: If this property is set, this UnitDef is an inverted unit. It inverts the unit specified by this property.
properties.name: InvertingUnit
